
:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
By default, {{< var validmind.platform >}} provides three suggested finding severities — [high]{.bubble .smallcaps}, [medium]{.bubble .smallcaps}, and [low]{.bubble .smallcaps}.

To add additional severities:

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

1. Under Findings, select **Finding Severities**.

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Finding Severity**.

1. Enter a **[name]{.smallcaps}** and select a **[color]{.smallcaps}** for the severity.

1. Click **Add Severity** to create the severity.

    Once added, [reorder the severities](/guide/model-validation/manage-finding-severities.qmd#reorder-finding-severities) as required.
